title: Social Media Editor NEEDED (Experienced!) PAYS WELL!
job_overview:
I am looking for an experienced Virtual Assistant who is SMART, FAST, and works hard. 

I make Instagram videos and reels to market my fashion business. I need a HARD WORKING, HONEST, and CREATIVE Virtual Assistant to help me edit, add text, and keep the brand look consistent.

Must be technologically SAVVY (use Canva, CapCut, etc). We all work hard and move fast. I'm looking for someone I can trust and work with for a long time, and LOTS of opportunity to increase the work in the future.  But you must be willing to commit, learn, and grow! 

If this sounds like you, reply to this job post with an inspirational quote that makes you happy, and share some content work you've done.

Look forward to meeting you!
